mapper.update: update service_content_transaction_log set TRAN_NO = #{tranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_TYPE = #{tranType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_DESC = #{tranDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NO = #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUP_NO = #{supNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_INFO = #{requestInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, TRAN_NO, PRODUCT_NO, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_DESC, ORG_NO, SUP_NO, REQUEST_INFO, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE from service_content_transaction_log where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ID, TRAN_NO, PRODUCT_NO, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_DESC, ORG_NO, SUP_NO, REQUEST_INFO, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE from service_content_transaction_log
select ID, TRAN_NO, PRODUCT_NO, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_DESC, ORG_NO, SUP_NO, REQUEST_INFO, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE from service_content_transaction_log where TRAN_NO =#{tranNo}
